name: Who Opened the Hatch?
description:
Use inertia to your advantage and rescue space people before oxygen runs out.  
Made for 20 Second Game Jam.
Windows version is coming soon!

Art       : April
Music : Claire
Font    : OpenDyslexic

Controls

W / Up
ForwardA / Left
Turn Left
D / Right
Turn Right
EscapeMenuR
Quick Restart

Cheats

PPause Timer
GInvincibilityXReset Position
